## RowSelector interface

Public API for row selector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RowSelector<TSelectedData, TData, TId> extends GridPlugin 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [selectedChange](./grid.rowselector.selectedchange.md) | <code>EventEmitter&lt;void&gt;</code> | Occurs when selection has changed |
|  [selectedData](./grid.rowselector.selecteddata.md) | <code>TSelectedData[]</code> | Array of currently selected row data |
|  [selectedIds](./grid.rowselector.selectedids.md) | <code>TId[]</code> | Array of currently selected row ids |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isSelected(item)](./grid.rowselector.isselected.md) | Gets indication whether item is currently selected |
|  [resetSelection()](./grid.rowselector.resetselection.md) | Resets current selection |
|  [selectItem(item, select)](./grid.rowselector.selectitem.md) | Adds item to selection (or remove it from selection if deselect is true) |
